description: Discover top open source frameworks crucial for indie hackers. These frameworks offer agility, community support, and freedom from licensing fees. Explore options like Ruby on Rails, Django, Flask, Laravel, React, Vue.js, Express.js, and Svelte to accelerate development and ensure the sustainability and success of your indie hacking projects.
keywords: indie hackers, open source frameworks, Ruby on Rails, Django, Flask, Laravel, React, Vue.js, Express.js, Svelte, web development, entrepreneurship, community support, project sustainability
title: Top Open Source Frameworks for Indie Hackers
